GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.4.204
GSD.description:
net: ipv6: unexport __init-annotated seg6_hmac_net_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit 9204bc3e8722191932074d826db2fcd1d378f8aa, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bf355b8d2c30a289232042cacc1cfaea4923936c. For more details please see the references link.
